name: OneBit Berzerk (Playdate)
description:
This is a new version of the classic arcade game. In it you must avoid colliding with the walls, eliminate the enemies and leave the screen before Evil Otto appears and chases you.

This version has two game modes:

  • Classic : It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies.
  • New mode : You must find the exit in each of the levels.

In the new mode there are a number of improvements over the classic:

  • Three types of enemies:
    • Robots
    • Roborats
    • Machine guns
  • At higher levels, the configuration of the walls can change from time to time while you are in the room.
  • There are powerups that can appear when killing enemies:
    • More movement speed
    • More simultaneous bullets
    • Evil Otto will not appear
    • Walls don't kill
    • Kill all enemies
    • The walls do not change their configuration
    • Show direction in which the exit room is
    • Extra life
  • There is a room with exit to the next level, it can be accessed once the enemies on the screen have been eliminated

Coded in LUA using PlayDate SDK by Oscar BraindeaD, 2022
